Gülfem Savrun Yeniçeri

gsavruny at uci dot edu

Research Interests

Programming languages, virtual machines, compilers, interpreters, runtime systems, software engineering

Educational Background

  • PhD in Computer Science, University of California, Irvine, September 2010 - present.
  • MS in Computer Science, New York University, September 2008 - May 2010.
  • MS in Computer Engineering, Bogazici University, September 2007 - April 2008. (Left the position voluntarily to pursue PhD studies in the USA).
  • BS in Computer Engineering, Mersin University, September 2003 - June 2007.
    Minor in Telecommunications
